content: The secrets start from the very first chapter of the game, and there's not one but two hidden bosses to uncover as you explore. The first is Elder Jinchi and the second is Red Loong. There are also Transformation Spells and missable Spirits that you'll want to bag before you wrap up the chapter.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", under the primary heading "Chapter 1 Secrets". The content is presented below:

The secrets start from the very first chapter of the game, and there's not one but two hidden bosses to uncover as you explore. The first is Elder Jinchi and the second is Red Loong. There are also Transformation Spells and missable Spirits that you'll want to bag before you wrap up the chapter.
